title: Audio
content:
Play audio through voice channels.
Commands bump Bump a track number to the top of the queue. bumpplay Force play a URL or search for a track. disconnect Disconnect from the voice channel. now Now playing. pause Pause or resume a playing track. percent Queue percentage. play Play the specified track or search for a close match. prev Skip to the start of the previously played track. queue List the songs in the queue. remove Remove a specific track number from the queue. repeat Toggle repeat. search Pick a track with a search. seek Seek ahead or behind on a track by seconds or to a specific time. shuffle Toggle shuffle. skip Skip to the next track, or to a given track number. stop Stop playback and clear the queue. summon Summon the bot to a voice channel. volume Set the volume, 1% - 150%. bump Syntax: gary bump <index> Bump a track number to the top of the queue.
bumpplay Syntax: gary bumpplay [play_now=False] <query> Force play a URL or search for a track.
disconnect Syntax: gary disconnect Disconnect from the voice channel.
now Syntax: gary now Now playing.
pause Syntax: gary pause Pause or resume a playing track.
percent Syntax: gary percent Queue percentage.
play Syntax: gary play <query> Play the specified track or search for a close match.
prev Syntax: gary prev Skip to the start of the previously played track.
queue Syntax: gary queue [page=1] List the songs in the queue.
Subcommands: clean Removes songs from the queue if the requester is not in the voice channel. cleanself Removes all tracks you requested from the queue. clear Clears the queue. search Search the queue. shuffle Shuffles the queue. remove Syntax: gary remove <index_or_url> Remove a specific track number from the queue.
repeat Syntax: gary repeat Toggle repeat.
search Syntax: gary search <query> Pick a track with a search.
Use gary search list <search term> to queue all tracks found on YouTube.
seek Syntax: gary seek <seconds> Seek ahead or behind on a track by seconds or to a specific time.
Accepts seconds or a value formatted like 00:00:00 (hh:mm:ss) or 00:00 (mm:ss).
shuffle Syntax: gary shuffle Toggle shuffle.
Subcommands bumped Toggle bumped track shuffle.
skip Syntax: gary skip [skip_to_track] Skip to the next track, or to a given track number.
stop Syntax: gary stop Stop playback and clear the queue.
summon Syntax: gary summon Summon the bot to a voice channel.
volume Syntax: gary volume [vol] Set the volume, 1% - 150%.

title: CatFact
content:
Play audio through voice channels.
catfact Gets a random cat fact. catfact Syntax: gary catfact Gets a random cat fact.

title: ChatGPT
content:
Base command for chatgpt related commands
chat Asks chatgpt a query chat Syntax: gary chat <query> Asks chatgpt a query

Commands cleverbot Talk with cleverbot cleverbot Syntax: gary cleverbot <message> Talk with cleverbot

Compliment users because there’s too many insults
Commands compliment Compliment the user compliment Syntax: gary compliment [user] Compliment the user
user the user you would like to compliment

title: ConversationGames
content:
Commands dare Dare someone! neverhaveiever Never have I truth Ask a truth question to users! wouldyourather Would you rather? dare Syntax: gary dare <user> Dare someone!
neverhaveiever Syntax: gary neverhaveiever Alias: gary nhie Never have I
truth Syntax: gary truth <user> Ask a truth question to users!
wouldyourather Syntax: gary wouldyourather Alias: gary wyr Would you rather?

title: Core
content:
The Core cog has many commands related to core functions. These commands come loaded with every Red bot, and cover some of the most basic usage of the bot.
Commands info Shows info about Gary Salad uptime Shows Gary Salad's uptime. info Syntax: gary info Shows info about Gary Salad
uptime Syntax: gary uptime Shows Gary Salad's uptime.

title: DadJokes
content:
Random dad jokes from icanhazdadjoke.com ​
Commands dadjoke Gets a random dad joke. dadjoke Syntax: gary dadjoke Gets a random dad joke.

title: DallE
content:
Dall-E mini image generation ​
Commands generate Generate images through Dall-E mini. generate Syntax: gary generate <prompt> Generate images through Dall-E mini.
https://huggingface.co/spaces/dalle-mini/dalle-mini

title: Deepfry
content:
Deepfries memes. ​
Commands deepfry Deepfries images. nuke Demolishes images. deepfry Syntax: gary deepfry [link] Alias: gary df Deepfries images.
The optional parameter “link” can be either a member or a direct link to an image.
nuke Syntax: gary nuke [link] Demolishes images.
The optional parameter “link” can be either a member or a direct link to an image.

title: Dice
content:
Perform complex dice rolling. Cog Version: 2.0.0
Commands dice Perform die roll based on a dice formula. dice Syntax: gary dice <roll> Perform die roll based on a dice formula.
The PyHedrals library is used for dice formula parsing.
Use the link above to learn the notation allowed. Below are a few examples:
2d20kh - Roll 2d20, keep highest die (e.g. initiative advantage) 4d4!+2 - Roll 4d4, explode on any 4s, add 2 to result 4d6rdl - Roll 4d6, reroll all 1s, then drop the lowest die 6d6c>4 - Roll 6d6, count all dice greater than 4 as successes 10d10r<=2kh6 - Roll 10d10, reroll all dice less than or equal to 2, then keep the highest 6 dice Modifier order does matter, and usually they allow for specifying a specific number or number ranges after them.

title: Dnd
content:
Interact with dnd5eapi.co ​
Commands classes List character classes condition Get info about a condition conditions List conditions healing Get info about Potions of Healing school Get info about a magic school schools List magic schools spell Get info about a spell spells List spells by level and optionally class classes Syntax: gary classes List character classes
Do gary spells <level> [character_class] to list spells for a class condition Syntax: gary condition <condition> Get info about a condition
condition is the name of the condition Do gary conditions to list possible conditions conditions Syntax: gary conditions List conditions
Do gary condition <condition> to get info about a condition healing Syntax: gary healing Alias: gary heal Get info about Potions of Healing
school Syntax: gary school <magic_school> Alias: gary magic Get info about a magic school
magic_school is the name of the magic school Do gary schools to list possible magic schools schools Syntax: gary schools Alias: gary magics List magic schools
Do gary school <magic_school> to get info about magic school spell Syntax: gary spell <spell_name> Get info about a spell
spell_name is the name of the spell Do gary spells <level> [character_class] to list possible spells spells Syntax: gary spells <level> [character_class] List spells by level and optionally class
level is the level of the spell (required) character_class is the class to list spells for (optional) Do gary classes to list possible character classes Do gary spell <spell_name> to get info about a spell

title: Fun
content:
Module for fun/meme commands.
RedBot V3 conversion of Appu’s Fun cog.
Commands oof React 🅾🇴🇫 to a message. react Add letter(s) as reaction to previous message. regional Replace letters with regional indicator emojis. space Add n spaces between each letter. Ex: Gary space 2 thicc. textflip Flip given text. vowelreplace Replaces all vowels in a word with a letter. oof Syntax: gary oof [message] React 🅾🇴🇫 to a message.
[message] Can be a message ID from the current channel, a jump URL, or a channel_id-message_id from shift + copying ID on the message.
react Syntax: gary react <msg> [message] Add letter(s) as reaction to previous message.
[message] Can be a message ID from the current channel, a jump URL, or a channel_id-message_id from shift + copying ID on the message.
regional Syntax: gary regional <msg> Replace letters with regional indicator emojis.
space Syntax: gary space <msg> Add n spaces between each letter. Ex: Gary space 2 thicc.
textflip Syntax: gary textflip <msg> Flip given text.
vowelreplace Syntax: gary vowelreplace <replace> <msg> Replaces all vowels in a word with a letter.

title: Gary
content: Aliases and Custom Commands ahahah: replies with [gif] you didn't say the magic word baer: replies with The livestock!!! beantube: replies with [gif] beantube beats: replies with [gif] cat drumming bushtit: replies with [image] bushtit bird birds: alias of bird chosen: replies with [image] you were the chosen one gary cowboy: alias of gif cowboy damage: replies with [gif] that's a lot of damage docs: replies with https://derek.games/garydocs dia: replies with [gif] so anyway I started blasting eagle: alias of play [audio] America, Fuck Yeah! f: replies with f fish: replies with [gif] omg fish fluffy: alias of cat goodnight: alias of gifr goodnight hashtags: replies with #StoatOnABoat #BatNuts hey: replies with and i say 'hey', what's goin' on?!?!?! joke: alias of dadjoke ka: replies with [gif] Joker saying hit me keyboardcat: alias of play [audio] Keyboard Cat olinn: replies with [gif] I got my tight pants on outpost: alias of play [audio] SKATT BROS - Life At The Outpost penis: replies with [gif] that's a penis podcast: alias of play [audio] SKATT BROS - Life At The Outpost r: alias of dice rai: replies with [gif] Midget strutting strut walking tableflip: replies with (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ themesong: alias of play [audio] SKATT BROS - Life At The Outpost trombone: alias of play [audio] Sad Trombone snap: replies with "sorry snap 6, snap 3 knew that guy" - Rai Cogs Audio CatFact ChatGPT Cleverbot Compliment ConversationGames Core DadJokes DallE Deepfry Dice Dnd Fun General Image Imdb Imgflip Inspirobot Insult Pokemon PressF Randimals Wikia Wingspan XKCD

title: General
content:
General commands. ​
Commands 8 Ask 8 ball a question. choose Choose between multiple options. flip Flip a coin… or a user. lmgtfy Create a lmgtfy link. roll Roll a random number. rps Play Rock Paper Scissors. serverinfo Show server information. stopwatch Start or stop the stopwatch. urban Search the Urban Dictionary. 8 Syntax: gary 8 <question> Alias: gary 8ball Ask 8 ball a question.
Question must end with a question mark.
choose Syntax: gary choose <first> <second> [others...] Choose between multiple options.
There must be at least 2 options to pick from.
Options are separated by spaces.
flip Syntax: gary flip [user] Flip a coin… or a user.
Defaults to a coin.
lmgtfy Syntax: gary lmgtfy <search_terms> Create a lmgtfy link.
roll Syntax: gary roll [number=100] Roll a random number.
The result will be between 1 and <number>.
<number> defaults to 100.
rps Syntax: gary rps <your_choice> Play Rock Paper Scissors.
serverinfo Syntax: gary serverinfo [details=False] Show server information.
details: Shows more information when set to True.
Default to False.
stopwatch Syntax: gary stopwatch Alias: gary sw Start or stop the stopwatch.
urban Syntax: gary urban <word> Search the Urban Dictionary.
This uses the unofficial Urban Dictionary API.

title: Image
content:
Image related commands. ​
Commands gif Retrieve the first search result from Giphy. gifr Retrieve a random GIF from a Giphy search. gif Syntax: gary gif <keywords...> Retrieve the first search result from Giphy.
<keywords...>: The keywords used to search Giphy.
gifr Syntax: gary gifr <keywords...> Retrieve a random GIF from a Giphy search.
<keywords...>: The keywords used to generate a random GIF.

title: Imdb
content:
Shows movie info ​
Commands movie Search for a movie tv Search for a tv show movie Syntax: gary movie <title> Search for a movie
tv Syntax: gary tv <title> Search for a tv show

title: Imgflip
content:
Generate memes from imgflip.com API
Commands getmemes List memes with names that can be used meme Create custom memes from imgflip getmemes Syntax: gary getmemes List memes with names that can be used
meme Syntax: gary meme <meme> <text> Create custom memes from imgflip
meme_name can be the name of the meme to use or the ID from imgflip
text is lines of text separated by |
Do !getmemes to see which meme names will work

title: Wikia
content:
Search wikia ​ Commands:
wikia Search wikia subdomain then bot will ask you which article you want to consult unless using a default wiki wikias Search wikia subdomain then bot will ask you which article you want to consult ignoring default wiki wikia Syntax: gary wikia <query> Search wikia subdomain then bot will ask you which article you want to consult unless using a default wiki
wikias Syntax: gary wikias <query> Search wikia subdomain then bot will ask you which article you want to consult ignoring default wiki
